application.name: apollopangenck
application.brief: Generate files to be used as input to NAIF utility msopck.
application.description: Generate files to be used as input to NAIF utility msopck. Location of Apollo Pan metadata csv is /archive/missions/apollo_pan/AS15/CriticalData/PanData/MetadataCSVVersions/.

parameter.name: FROMPVL
parameter.brief: Input Apollo Pan metadata csv file.
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the filename to import.

parameter.name: FROMREVSUPPORT
parameter.brief: Input Apollo Pan support data file.
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the filename to import.
